DUAL CHORUS LFO
OUTPUTS TWO SINE WAVES
ONE RUNNING 20% FASTER
PARAM SETS BASE FREQ
BETWEEN 0.16 AND 7.8 HZ
TR1 RESETS BOTH LFOS

#1
L 0 3: PN.I I PN.START I
L 1 4: CV.SLEW I 0
L 1 4: CV I PN.HERE - I 1

#2

#3

#4

#5

#6

#7

#8

#M
M! PRM
L 1 4: CV.SLEW I * PRM 2
L 1 4: CV I PN.NEXT - I 1

#I
PARAM.SCALE 100 2
M.ACT 1

#P
